name: part_007
file: tmp_【重大告知あり！！】FBKINGDOM Fest. #機密解禁フブキングダム【白上フブキ⧸ホロライブ】 [ES9vrNjxiIQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: MC section. Fubuki thanks the audience and announces a new song.
Two Sukombu mascots (voiced by Suisei and Miko) appear and interact with Fubuki.

subtitles.original: Let you go, I follow you forever
subtitles.english: Let you go, I follow you forever

subtitles.original: 幸せって 君と出会って
subtitles.english: Happiness is meeting you,

subtitles.original: 過ごす日々だと定義された
subtitles.english: and it was defined by the days we spend.

subtitles.original: 会えない時間だっていい
subtitles.english: The time we can't meet is fine too.

subtitles.original: 愛を育てろって事です
subtitles.english: It just means to nurture our love.

subtitles.original: どうしたって 叫びたくなる
subtitles.english: No matter what, I want to scream.

subtitles.original: イタズラが功を奏したのかも
subtitles.english: Maybe the prank worked out.

subtitles.original: 来世も来来来世までも語り継ぎたいのです
subtitles.english: I want to tell our story even to the next life.

subtitles.original: 一瞬一瞬がときめく 両手にいっぱいの思い出
subtitles.english: Every single moment thrills me, both hands full of memories.

subtitles.original: 確かめ合えば寂しくないから つなげて絆の結晶
subtitles.english: If we confirm it together, we won't be lonely, let's connect the crystal of our bond.

subtitles.original: Be my faith! 頑張ってなんて言えない
subtitles.english: Be my faith! I can't just say "Good luck!"

subtitles.original: 「大丈夫」の三文字で伝わるかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if I can convey it with the words "It's okay."

subtitles.original: Day by day さあ 君のおかげで
subtitles.english: Day by day, now, thanks to you.

subtitles.original: 少しだけ自分を好きになれたから
subtitles.english: I've come to like myself just a little bit more.

subtitles.original: 君らしく keep smiling enjoy yourself
subtitles.english: Just be yourself, keep smiling and enjoy yourself.

subtitles.original: 心から願うわ 私がいる 一人じゃない
subtitles.english: I wish from the bottom of my heart, I'm here, you're not alone.

subtitles.original: Be my faith! 大好きを集めた
subtitles.english: Be my faith! I've gathered all my favorites.

subtitles.original: 合言葉 手紙に書いて送るね
subtitles.english: I'll write the password in a letter and send it to you.

subtitles.original: You make my days 夢で終わらない
subtitles.english: You make my days, it's not just a dream.

subtitles.original: 君だけが 君こそが起こす奇跡
subtitles.english: Only you, it's you who makes the miracle happen.

subtitles.original: You will always be the fan in my heart
subtitles.english: You will always be the fan in my heart.

subtitles.original: 信じてよ 夜空の星のようにずっと
subtitles.english: Please believe me, forever like the stars in the night sky.

subtitles.original: I will follow you forever
subtitles.english: I will follow you forever.

subtitles.original: ありったけの愛を込めて ありがとう
subtitles.english: With all the love I have, thank you.

subtitles.original: 君と歩むたった一つの奇跡
subtitles.english: The one and only miracle of walking with you.

subtitles.original: 銀河を超えて風合わせ 輝かせて
subtitles.english: Crossing the galaxy, meeting the wind, make it shine.

subtitles.original: Best wishes to you la la la la...
subtitles.english: Best wishes to you la la la la...

subtitles.original: はい！ということで、LETTER☆彡！
subtitles.english: Yes! So that was LETTER☆彡!

subtitles.original: みんなコメントもいっぱい！ありがとう！
subtitles.english: So many comments everyone! Thank you!

subtitles.original: ちょっと、しんどいですね...
subtitles.english: I'm a bit out of breath...

subtitles.original: はい！いやもう本当に、やっぱりLETTERは楽しいですね。
subtitles.english: Yes! Wow, LETTER is really fun after all.

subtitles.original: そしてこの身体がやっぱりしっくりくるんだ！
subtitles.english: And this body really feels right after all!

subtitles.original: ふぅ〜。みんな、いっぱい盛り上がってくれてありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Phew. Thank you everyone for getting so excited!

subtitles.original: さてさて、ではもうね、いいお時間なので、
subtitles.english: Now then, since it's about that time,

subtitles.original: 重大告知、えー、1個目、
subtitles.english: The first, uh, major announcement,

subtitles.original: 発表したいと思いまーす！
subtitles.english: I'd like to announce it!

subtitles.original: なんと、なんと、なんと...
subtitles.english: Guess what, guess what, guess what...

subtitles.original: 新曲がありまーす！
subtitles.english: There's a new song!

subtitles.original: わー！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 新曲だ！
subtitles.english: A new song!

subtitles.original: 嬉しい新曲だ！
subtitles.english: I'm so happy, it's a new song!

subtitles.original: あれ？待って？あれ？
subtitles.english: Wait? What? Huh?

subtitles.original: もしかして、その声は...あれ？
subtitles.english: Could it be, those voices are...?

subtitles.original: およ〜？
subtitles.english: Oyo~?

subtitles.original: およ〜？
subtitles.english: Oyo~?

subtitles.original: すいちゃん？
subtitles.english: Suichan?

subtitles.original: あれ？みこさん？
subtitles.english: Wait, Miko-san?

subtitles.original: すこん部だよ。
subtitles.english: They're Sukombu.

subtitles.original: え、待って、どっち、え、スカーフの方がこっち？
subtitles.english: Wait, which one... is the scarf one this one?

subtitles.original: こっちが...
subtitles.english: Is this one...

subtitles.original: すいちゃーん！
subtitles.english: Suichan!

subtitles.original: すいちゃん！
subtitles.english: Suichan!

subtitles.original: すいちゃん、スコン部になっちゃったの！？
subtitles.english: Suichan, you became a Sukombu!?

subtitles.original: すこんぶ、すこんぶ〜！
subtitles.english: Sukombu, sukombu!
Wow!

subtitles.original: 小さくなっちゃって。
subtitles.english: You've become so small.

subtitles.original: わ〜、しっぽもふもふ。で、こっち子...
subtitles.english: Wow, the tail is so fluffy. And this one...

subtitles.original: みこ〜！
subtitles.english: Miko!

subtitles.original: みこだぉ〜！
subtitles.english: It's Miko!

subtitles.original: みこさん。
subtitles.english: Miko-san.

subtitles.original: あれ？みこさん、そのリボンはね、
subtitles.english: Oh? Miko-san, that ribbon is,

subtitles.original: あの、海外すこん部、いわゆるフレ（フレンド）ズなんだけど、
subtitles.english: uh, Overseas Sukombu, the so-called "Friends."

subtitles.original: みこさん、あれ、もしや海外...
subtitles.english: Miko-san, could it be you're Overseas...

subtitles.original: え？よく、もしやENのスコン部ってこと？
subtitles.english: Eh? So does that mean I'm an EN Sukombu?

subtitles.original: ハイフレ。ハイフレ。
subtitles.english: Hi-fre! Hi-fre!

subtitles.original: なっちゃったんだ。お、え〜、
subtitles.english: You became one. Oh, uh...

subtitles.original: すこんぶだよ。
subtitles.english: It's a Sukombu.

subtitles.original: すいちゃんもこれJPのすこんぶになっちゃって。
subtitles.english: Suichan has become a JP Sukombu too.

subtitles.original: あらら。
subtitles.english: Oh dear.

subtitles.original: 二人とも、あれ、どうしたの？
subtitles.english: What happened to you two?

subtitles.original: なんかさっき本当アホみたいな呪いをかけて...
subtitles.english: Like you put some really stupid curse on earlier...

subtitles.original: アホじゃないよ！アホじゃないよ！
subtitles.english: It's not stupid! It's not stupid!

subtitles.original: さっきフブさんが元の姿に戻ったでしょ？
subtitles.english: Fubu-san went back to her original form earlier, right?

subtitles.original: そしたらこんな風になっちゃった。
subtitles.english: Then we ended up like this.

subtitles.original: 逆に？
subtitles.english: The other way around?

subtitles.original: あの呪いが返ってきたんだ。かわいそう。
subtitles.english: The curse came back. Poor things.

subtitles.original: アホ呪い二人だから。
subtitles.english: Because you're the "Stupid Curse Duo."

subtitles.original: 悪いことするから。
subtitles.english: Because you did something bad.

subtitles.original: お前のせいだろ！お前が悪いんだよ！
subtitles.english: It's your fault! You're the one to blame!

subtitles.original: お前のせいだ！
subtitles.english: It's your fault!

subtitles.original: あーっ！ちょっと、何やって、これ。
subtitles.english: Ah! Hey, what are you doing?

subtitles.original: 戦うな戦うな。これから歌うんだよ。
subtitles.english: Don't fight, don't fight. We're going to sing now.

subtitles.original: やめなさい。
subtitles.english: Stop it.
